channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection’ Confirms The Final Two Games
item.description: We finally know the full list of all eleven games and all 20 versions of Mortal Kombat included in the upcoming collection.

item.title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Prices Drop Even Further In New Offer Before iPhone 17 Release
item.description: As the days count down to the arrival of the next iPhones, it means that current renewed premium prices have dropped again.

item.title: CDC Sends Termination Notices To 600 Employees, Including 100 Working In Violence Prevention
item.description: The CDC sent termination notices to 600 employees, including 100 who prevent violence. This comes days after a fatal shooting at the CDC headquarters.

item.title: Why More People Without Diabetes Are Using Glucose Monitors
item.description: Glucose monitors promise real-time insights into health, but data can be misleading without context. Here’s what to know before trying one.

item.title: Guild, Beckham’s Former Esports Team, Folds After 6 Years
item.description: Just 13 days short of its iron anniversary, British competitive gaming outfit Guild Esports, once backed by David Beckham, has announced it’s shutting...

item.title: The violinist problem

item.title: “No” is an option
item.description: “Maybe” is the problem. If you’re serious, say, “yes.” And if it’s not for you, walk away. But endlessly reconsidering opportunities without forward m...
